title: Man In Critical Condition After Hearing Slightly Different Viewpoint
description:
It's a serious medical emergency: you're minding your own business when you hear an opinion you slightly disagree with. Will the doctors be able to save this man's life?

The government told you Social Distancing worked. They also told you the COVID-19 jab would spare you from getting Covid. iCan said the opposite. Support their efforts: https://secure.anedot.com/informed-consent-action-network/wewin

#comedy #conservative #babylonbee
